org.safs.tools.ocr.gocr

Class GOCREngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.tools.ocr.OCREngine
      • org.safs.tools.ocr.gocr.GOCREngine

  • public class GOCREngine
extends OCREngine
    Extends OCREngine to support GOCR/JOCR engine. http://jocr.sourceforge.net/ It requires JAI Imageio installed. http://java.sun.com/products/java-media/jai/INSTALL-jai_imageio_1_0_01.html#Windows https://jai-imageio.dev.java.net/binary-builds.html
    Author:
    Junwu Ma
    DEC 21, 2009 Original Release
    JAN 15, 2009 (JunwuMa) Adding support to use trained data as an alternative.
    JAN 27, 2009 (JunwuMa) Move runCommandLine() to its super.
    FEB 25, 2010 (JunwuMa) Refactoring for OCR keywords.

        public java.lang.String imageToText(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                    java.lang.String langId,
                                    java.awt.Rectangle subarea,
                                    float zoom)
                             throws SAFSException
        Description copied from class: OCREngine
        Convert buffered image to text using OCR technology. It needs to be implemented in its derived class.
        Overrides:
        imageToText in class OCREngine
        Returns:
        String, converted from the input image. NULL if fails to convert.
        Throws:
        SAFSException - if meets any Exception
